Code 
library(mitools)

# Create missingness

set.seed(20211222)

dat_miss <- 
  dat.assink2016 %>%
  group_by(study) %>%
  mutate(
    pubstatus = if_else(rbinom(1L, 1L, 0.15) == 1L, NA_integer_, unique(pubstatus)),
    pubstatus = factor(pubstatus, levels = 0:1, labels = c("unpublished","published")),
    deltype = if_else(rbinom(n(), 1L, prob = plogis(-2.5 - 0.1 * year)) == 1L, NA_character_, deltype),
    deltype = factor(deltype)
  )

# Impute missing values 20 times

predMatrix <- make.predictorMatrix(dat_miss)
predMatrix[,c("study","esid","id")] <- 0 # don't use study or esid or id for imputing

impMethod <- make.method(dat_miss)
impMethod
    study      esid        id        yi        vi pubstatus      year   deltype 
       ""        ""        ""        ""        ""  "logreg"        "" "polyreg"
Code 
imp <- mice(dat_miss, m = 20, print = FALSE,
            predictorMatrix = predMatrix, 
            method=impMethod, seed = 20211222)
Warning: Number of logged events: 70
Code 
# Fit SCE+ model
fits <- with(imp, rma.mv(
  yi = yi, 
  V = impute_covariance_matrix(vi = vi, cluster = study, r = 0.6, subgroup = deltype),
  mods = ~ pubstatus + deltype + year,
  random = list(~ deltype | study, ~ deltype | id),
  struct = c("DIAG","DIAG")
))

# Get coefficients
coefs <- map(fits$analyses, coef)

# Get CR2 variance-covariance matrices
vcovs <- map(fits$analyses, vcovCR, type = "CR2")

# Get denominator df from complete-data F-tests
q <- 2
dfs <- 
  map_dfr(fits$analyses, Wald_test, vcov = "CR2", constraints = constrain_zero(3:4), test = "HTZ") %>%
  mutate(
    eta = df_denom + (q - 1)
  )
eta <- mean(dfs$eta)

# Combine imputed results
res <- MIcombine(results = coefs, variances = vcovs)
res$coefficients
           intrcpt pubstatuspublished       deltypeovert      deltypecovert 
        0.89897557        -0.55770641        -0.38101335        -0.46723794 
              year 
       -0.02576823
Code 
res$variance
                        intrcpt pubstatuspublished deltypeovert deltypecovert
intrcpt             0.074539990       -0.083961055 -0.058577509  0.0010494026
pubstatuspublished -0.083961055        0.103264128  0.067143253 -0.0032322645
deltypeovert       -0.058577509        0.067143253  0.106429073 -0.0108120063
deltypecovert       0.001049403       -0.003232265 -0.010812006  0.0321119131
year                0.002758525       -0.004318211 -0.003867039  0.0002642099
                            year

pubstatuspublished -0.0043182112
deltypeovert       -0.0038670392
deltypecovert       0.0002642099
year                0.0004815795
Code 
# Calculate manual HTZ test using averaged eta 
Cmat <- constrain_zero(3:4, coefs = res$coefficients)
Q <- t(Cmat %*% res$coefficients) %*% solve(Cmat %*% res$variance %*% t(Cmat)) %*% (Cmat %*% res$coefficients)
Fstat <- (eta - q + 1) / (eta * q) * as.numeric(Q)
p_val <- pf(Fstat, df1 = q, df2 = eta - q + 1, lower.tail = FALSE)
data.frame(Fstat = Fstat, df_num = q, df_denom = eta - q + 1, p_val = p_val)
     Fstat df_num df_denom     p_val
1 3.003452      2 1.663534 0.2804675

$$
\def\Pr{{\text{Pr}}}
\def\E{{\text{E}}}
\def\Var{{\text{Var}}}
\def\Cov{{\text{Cov}}}
$$

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(metadat)
library(metafor)
library(clubSandwich)
library(mice)
library(mitools)

# Create missingness

set.seed(20211222)

dat_miss <- 
  dat.assink2016 %>%
  group_by(study) %>%
  mutate(
    pubstatus = if_else(rbinom(1L, 1L, 0.15) == 1L, NA_integer_, unique(pubstatus)),
    pubstatus = factor(pubstatus, levels = 0:1, labels = c("unpublished","published")),
    deltype = if_else(rbinom(n(), 1L, prob = plogis(-2.5 - 0.1 * year)) == 1L, NA_character_, deltype),
    deltype = factor(deltype)
  )

# Impute missing values 20 times

predMatrix <- make.predictorMatrix(dat_miss)
predMatrix[,c("study","esid","id")] <- 0 # don't use study or esid or id for imputing

impMethod <- make.method(dat_miss)
impMethod

imp <- mice(dat_miss, m = 20, print = FALSE,
            predictorMatrix = predMatrix, 
            method=impMethod, seed = 20211222)

# Fit SCE+ model
fits <- with(imp, rma.mv(
  yi = yi, 
  V = impute_covariance_matrix(vi = vi, cluster = study, r = 0.6, subgroup = deltype),
  mods = ~ pubstatus + deltype + year,
  random = list(~ deltype | study, ~ deltype | id),
  struct = c("DIAG","DIAG")
))

# Get coefficients
coefs <- map(fits$analyses, coef)

# Get CR2 variance-covariance matrices
vcovs <- map(fits$analyses, vcovCR, type = "CR2")

# Get denominator df from complete-data F-tests
q <- 2
dfs <- 
  map_dfr(fits$analyses, Wald_test, vcov = "CR2", constraints = constrain_zero(3:4), test = "HTZ") %>%
  mutate(
    eta = df_denom + (q - 1)
  )
eta <- mean(dfs$eta)

# Combine imputed results
res <- MIcombine(results = coefs, variances = vcovs)
res$coefficients
res$variance

# Calculate manual HTZ test using averaged eta 
Cmat <- constrain_zero(3:4, coefs = res$coefficients)
Q <- t(Cmat %*% res$coefficients) %*% solve(Cmat %*% res$variance %*% t(Cmat)) %*% (Cmat %*% res$coefficients)
Fstat <- (eta - q + 1) / (eta * q) * as.numeric(Q)
p_val <- pf(Fstat, df1 = q, df2 = eta - q + 1, lower.tail = FALSE)
data.frame(Fstat = Fstat, df_num = q, df_denom = eta - q + 1, p_val = p_val)
```
